statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_id, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT sale_date, product_id FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE product_id = 1 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount ASC;
SELECT product_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_id, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE product_id IN (2, 3, 5) ORDER BY sale_amount DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Clothing' AND price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, product_category, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 100 ORDER BY product_category, price DESC
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, quantity, total_amount FROM sales WHERE total_amount >= 100 ORDER BY sale_date ASC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics'
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT p.product_name, s.quantity, s.total_amount FROM products p INNER JOIN sales s ON p.product_id = s.product_id
SELECT s.sale_id, s.sale_date, p.product_name, s.quantity FROM sales s LEFT JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_id, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_date between '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT product_name, category, price, sale_date FROM products LEFT JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE total_amount > 500 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT trend_name, description, start_date, end_date FROM trends WHERE start_date <= '2023-01-01' AND end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, o.quantity, o.total_amount FROM products p JOIN orders o ON p.id = o.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY name DESC, price ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 100 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;

SELECT customers.name AS customer_name, orders.order_id, SUM(orders.total_amount) AS total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.product_id GROUP BY customers.name, orders.order_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT products.name, sales.sale_date FROM products INNER JOIN sales ON products.id = sales.order_id WHERE sales.sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY sales.sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trends;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trends ORDER BY trend_name ASC;
